Text:
This torrent is half the size and includes all the expansions. Why on earth a 13.53GB file?


Use this one, much faster and is half the size.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5559958/World_of_Warcraft_-_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_%28installer%29_%28FastDown

Don't use the torrent ripper9 posted. How could possible be 7.66 GB (note the "no compression" thing, moreover), if only Lich King client is a 6 and something GB file? It's nonsense.
I'll go with this one. At least I know that when my download finishes, I have everything inside.
